topic.title: Localizing the Email Notifications of the WebHelp with Feedback System

keywords.indexterm: localize WebHelp with Feedback system emails

body.p: The WebHelp with Feedback system uses emails to notify users when comments are posted. These emails are based on templates stored in the WebHelp directory. The default messages are in English, French, German, and Japanese. These messages are copied into the WebHelp system deployment directory during the execution of the corresponding transformation scenario.
Suppose that you want to localize the emails into Dutch (nl). Follow these steps:

ol.li: Copy all English template files from \frameworks\docbook\xsl\com.oxygenxml.webhelp\oxygen-webhelp\resources\php\templates\en and paste them into the directory you just created.
Edit the HTML files from the \frameworks\docbook\xsl\com.oxygenxml.webhelp\oxygen-webhelp\resources\php\templates\nl directory and translate the content into Dutch.
Start and edit the WebHelp with Feedback transformation scenario.

In the Parameters tab, look for the l10n.gentext.default.language parameter and set its value to the appropriate language code. In our example, use the value nl for Dutch.If you set the parameter to a value such as LanguageCode-CountryCode (for example, en-us), the transformation scenario will only use the language code
Run the transformation scenario to obtain the WebHelp with Feedback output.
Copy all English template files from \plugins\com.oxygenxml.webhelp\oxygen-webhelp\resources\php\templates\en and paste them into the directory you just created.
Edit the HTML files from the \plugins\com.oxygenxml.webhelp\oxygen-webhelp\resources\php\templates\nl directory and translate the content into Dutch.
Start and edit one of WebHelp Classic with Feedback or WebHelp Responsive with Feedback transformation scenario.

In the Parameters tab, look for the args.default.language parameter and set its value to the appropriate language code. In our example, use the value nl for Dutch.If you set the parameter to a value such as LanguageCode-CountryCode (for example, en-us), the transformation scenario will only use the language code
Run the transformation scenario to obtain the WebHelp with Feedback output.
